data.title: Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast – Pop Culture Retrorama
data.meta_description: Posts about Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast written by Vic Sage
data.text:
Category Archives: Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast

This Is The Way – Bonus Episode

This bonus episode for the Pop Culture Retrorama, Saturday Frights, and Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast – serves as an announcement and explanation for why I am retiring.

But it is not the end of the Pop Culture Retrorama site – as you will soon learn.

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 053 – Qbert

Q*bert is the subject for this last episode for Season 2 of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 052 – Krull

Krull from 1983 is the subject of this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 051 – Venture

1981’s Venture by Exidy is the subject for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast.

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 050 – Starcade

Starcade is the subject of this 50th episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 049 – Kung-Fu Master

For this episode of the podcast we are tackling 1984’s Kung-Fu Master!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 048 – Howard Scott Warshaw

Howard Scott Warshaw is the subject for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 047 – Games People Play

Friends, it is the Games People Play arcade that is the subject for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 046 – Smash TV

Smash TV, the 1990 twin stick shooter from Williams is the subject of this Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 045 – Bosconian

1981’s Bosconian is the subject for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 044 – The Empire Strikes Back

For this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast – we are talking about 1982’s The Empire Strikes Back!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 043 – Elevator Action

On this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast we are going to be talking about 1983’s Elevator Action!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 042 – Popeye

The 1982 Popeye arcade game by Nintendo is the subject of our first episode of the second season of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – River Raid

For this new 1UP episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee we are tackling 1982’s River Raid!

Let’s Talk About The Podcasts – Bonus Episode

Friends, Let’s Talk About The Podcasts Bonus Episode concerns all three shows I produce.

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 041 – Wizard Of Wor (1981)

For the first episode of 2020, the Diary Podcast is focusing on 1981’s Wizard of Wor!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 040 – Star Castle

For Episode 40 of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast I am tackling 1980’s Star Castle!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – Night Stalker

On this Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP show – we are talking about 1982’s Night Stalker!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 039 – Asteroids

Asteroids is the subject of this Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast – hope you can enjoy the show!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – Top 5 Activision Games

For this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast we have a 1UP show – the Top 5 Activision Games for the Atari 2600!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – Ice Climber

Friends, for this 1UP episode of the Diary of an Arcade Employee podcast we are tackling 1985’s Ice Climber!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 038 – Donkey Kong (1981)

On this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee I tackle 1981’s Donkey Kong!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – TRON: Deadly Discs

For this Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP episode – I discuss 1982’s TRON: Deadly Discs for the Intellivision!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – Pressure Cooker

On this Diary of An Arcade Employee 1UP Podcast I will be discussing 1983’s Pressure Cooker!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast 1UP – Top 5 Imagic Games

For this 1UP episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast – I will be tackling the Top 5 Imagic Games for the Atari 2600!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 037 – Bubble Bobble (1986)

On this episode we are tackling 1986’s Bubble Bobble by Taito!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 036 – Pac Land

It is 1984’s Pac-Land that I am tackling on this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 035 – Bionic Commando

It is 1988’s Bionic Commando that is the subject of this latest episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 034 – BugerTime

1982’s BurgerTime is the subject of this latest Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 033 – Centipede

For this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast we tackle 1981’s Centipede – one of the greatest arcade games of all time!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 032 – Satan’s Hollow

For this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast – we are taking a look at 1982’s Satan’s Hollow by Bally/Midway!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 031 – Pooyan

1982’s Pooyan is the subject for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 030 – Dig Dug

Dig Dug is the subject for this Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 029 – Rampage

For this latest episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee we are tackling 1986’s Rampage!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 028 – Space Invaders

1978’s Space Invaders is the subject for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 027 – Crystal Castles

Crystal Castles is the subject of this 27th episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 026 – Warlords

Warlords is the subject for this special episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 025 – Sunset Riders

Sunset Riders is the subject for this episode of Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 024 – Splatterhouse

Splatterhouse from 1988 is the subject for this Diary of An Arcade Employee Podcast – the second Halloween Special for the show!

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 023 – Congo Bongo

Congo Bongo is the subject for this latest episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast.

Diary Of An Arcade Employee Podcast Ep. 022 – Street Fighter II

We tackle Street Fighter II for this episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast!

Friends, thank you for taking the time to join us once again for an episode of the Diary of An Arcade Employee podcast. On the show today we are taking a little time to check out another arcade game or home console title that are rightfully considered classics in video games. As always I attempt …
